TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GKSendDataMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration that allows data transmission to trade off speed for reliability.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.GameKit.GKSendDataMode Reliable = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Slower, but rebroadcast until received. Reliable data is guaranteed to arrive in order of transmission.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.GameKit.GKSendDataMode Unreliable = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Fast, but not guaranteed to arrive and may arrive out of order.
